description:
Shizuru is taken captive, and Nadeko and the others must infiltrate a horde of zombies to rescue her. However, they`ll first need to hoodwink the queen of the zombies.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Zombie That Laughs Is No Zombie at All
Warau Zombie wa Zombie ja Nai
笑うゾンビはゾンビじゃない
